metadata.title: CVE-2021-40346 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An integer overflow exists in HAProxy 2.0 through 2.5 in htx_add_header that can be exploited to perform an HTTP request smuggling attack, allowing an attacker to bypass all configured http-request HAProxy ACLs and possibly other ACLs.

criterions.comment: haproxy package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.9-1ubuntu0.2').
